title: Your mission, should you choose to accept it...
text:
...is to hang out with me! 

I know, that doesn't sound so great, but hear me out. Cake is involved. 

I moved here fairly recently and thought it was about time I started attempting to make friends. As such, I'm looking to meet new and fascinating people. Or new and mildly interesting people, if that's all you have to offer. Beggars can't be choosers, I guess. 

I'm a rather low-key person, so I personally prefer quiet outings to museums, parks, zoos, monasteries, mime colleges, space vacuums...stuff like that. That being said, I should probably at least attempt to break free from my comfort zone, so I'd be willing to try other stuff. I'm sure we'd be able to find something fun to do, because we're both awesome people, right? Hell yeah. *high five* I'm going to pretend you did it back. I'm also going to pretend it's 1997 and it's still cool to high five. 

If you're still reading this, good for you. You're one step closer to cake. 

All I'm really looking for in a friend is someone capable of laughing, not just at the world around them, but at themselves. I just don't get along with people who take themselves too seriously and can't joke back and forth. 

So that's about it. Hopefully I'll hear from someone cool and engaging. And if you're a serial killer, I'm not falling for any of your crap. Fool me twice, shame on me. 

Oh, and by the way...

The cake is a lie.
eye color: Like the sea after a storm

title: *Attention AIRSOFT/Millitary Simulation/War Game/Paintball Enthusiasts
text:
We are setting up and hosting a regular AIRSOFT/MilSim/WarGames for those who have interests in such.
We are also looking for those who host or are into hosting/helping out AIRSOFT events.

In new york there aren't many Airsoft areas, and the places they are mostly CQC (Close Quarter Combat) and don't give you much freedom of movement missing the OFE (Open Field Engagement) aspect or real, raw, gritty forest environments. You also have to pay a lot for these places.
We like the outdoors and this is great for outdoor enthusiasts as well, so you can use ghillie suits and deep cover and really get a full feel and use of the outdoor environment in a combat situation. 

Those who have interest in playing AIRSOFT/MilSims/Etc were are building groups of people who just want to play and have fun or even the serious players.
Also Current or Former Military personnel welcomed.
No charge just follow the rules of the land.
We also will except new possible locations known by anyone. We can also hold an indoor CQC event but those will have to be paid for. Main events are outdoors and free. 

You can bring your own teams of people if you have, we will Have Monthly or Bi-Weekly Battles depending on attendance. 
It is Bring Your Own Weapons & Gears (AIRSOFT ONLY, Not Paintball)
NO SMOKE GRENADES ALLOWED, All other grenades/RPGs/Grenade Launchers are ok
For those who do not have, Rental can be available for the few special situations. But it is recommended to bring your own Equipment as you will not have choice on the weapon you might get.
You are responsable for your own equipment and your own travel.

*We also have Armed Combat training for those who are interested.*

If you are unfamiliar with AIRSOFT/MilSims/War Games/ etc you can watch any of the videos below

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4s4eiczQeQ

(Playlist)
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQOB_yCwC5J0X8yMfMEZoTBjeWZud3fYP

***Requirements***
-18 Years of age, 16-17 Allowed with parental signature you are responsable for your own travel and equipment
-Allowed Airsoft Weapon Systems- AEG, Spring, Gas, CO2
-Full/Half Face masks recommended Not Mandatory But Eye Protection Required
-All Weapons must be Covered or in some kind of bag or Weapon case/bag when brought to and from locations
-Orange/Red Muzzle Tip Required on All Weapons with exceptions to Mini guns, Grenade launchers and RPGs
-No weapon system higher than 600 FPS
-Allowed 6mm pellets are .12g - .20g - .25g No heavier
-All Weapons are allowed anything from pistols to Snipers and LMG, also Mini guns are allowed if you can manage
-Recommended to wear tactical gear and camo but you can wear anything you feel comfortable in, costumes as well. Juggernaut suit also allowed (Must have 2 Bike bells/any bells attached)

title: In search of Responsible (Gay) Roommate for May 1st (or flexible)
text:
NOTE: I posted this ad is the housing section as well. I'm posting in here because I'd prefer a gay roommate but most responses I've had so far have been straight females. I know this is a odd way to start a roommate ad- but I just want to say this is a strictly platonic roommate situation. I dont have sex with my roommates or exchange sexual favors for discounts on rent. You laugh, but I'm writing this disclaimer because it's been asked or expected from other roommate interviews I've had over the years in NYC.... 
having said that, on to the important stuff!

The larger bedroom of a 2 bedroom Upper East Side apartment is available for sublet through May 2016- with option to stay longer.

The bedroom is furnished with with a full sized mattress & boxspring, nightstand with 2 drawers, large dresser, and a decent sized closet with some above storage space as well. 

The bedroom is North facing and the whole apartment gets great light all day long. 
One entire wall is exposed brick for that real NYC feel. The room is roughly 9ft x 10.5ft
The entire apartment is roughly 500sq ft, give or take a few feet here and there (it's not a perfect square.) 

The rest of the apartment is cozy and functional. 
It's an older building that hasn't been updated in a while, but it definitely gives you that NYC charm ;-)
We share the bathroom. It's decent, narrow-ish sink and vanity, shower/tub have a window making it great to have natural light in the day.

Kitchen is fine. I like to cook, and wish I had more counter space, but it's most definitely workable.
I would say it's a 3/4 sized fridge & stove, but I'd never had a problem with that. Microwave, Keurig coffee maker, but no dishwasher. 
There are 2 windows in the kitchen area and ceiling fan... Ooooh!

The living room / dining area is a cute open area with tall bar height table that seats 2, a sofa (w/ chaise lounger), a chair and large tufted ottoman- also has exposed brick.
42" TV mounted on wall with Time Warner Cable, DVR, Wifi

My bedroom is the smaller of the 2 and faces south. 
The bedrooms do not share a wall, they are on opposite corners.

It is the 5th floor or a 5th floor walkup. (sorry... but you get used to it, trust me!)
A few blocks walk to 4/5/6 express & local trains, and busses. Tons of grocery shopping close by (Whole Foods, C-Town, Key Food, Fairway etc) Lots of shopping, restaurants, bars. Several dry cleaners and laundromats with a few blocks. The laundromat I use is 24 hours. There are several gyms nearby and we're close to Central Park & museums.

Room is $1200/mo + Utilities (roughly $100/mo each, a little more in Air Conditioning Season)
Security Deposit $1200 (but negotiable if only staying a short time)

The current lease is in my former roommate's name and ends May 31st, and I plan on renewing into my name. We can keep it a month to month situation. ( I respectfully ask you to give to 45 days notice if you plan on leaving) But if things are going well, we could have the option to renew the lease together. 

------------------
IN SEARCH OF:
Ideally looking for a late 20's or 30's, responsible and considerate roommate. I'd prefer someone who's not right out of school, lived in NYC a bit, or has a professional (steady) job.
I'm a gay man, and would love to find another gay man, to live with, but open to anyone who is easy going laid back, and pays the rent on time. We don't need to be best friends, but I'd rather not have a roommate that just comes home says "Hi" and shuts the door. Someone who has some similar interests, maybe watch some TV together, or eat dinner together once in awhile would be nice... but not required.

ME:
34yr old gay male. I work full time mon-fri but with varying hours and I love my job (sometimes I work early morning to mid afternoon, sometimes mid afternoon to 10pm)
I work out; my gym in is Chelsea. I like art & design and dance music... and other stereotypical gay things like unicorns. I could care less about sports on TV, but I like a lot of good tv! Game of Thrones, Homeland, House of Cards, Billions, American Horror Story, Broad City, Angie Tribeca, Family Guy, The Office, Barely Famous, Fresh off the Boat, Law & Order (SVU) - if there is a marathon- forget it, cancel all my plans. I also love shit on the history channel like Ancient Aliens, Cities of the Underworld and Natural Disaster prediction shows.... 

I'm easy going, have a good (but often filthy & sarcastic) sense of humor. A sense of humor in a roommate is important to me. If you don't have a good one... then you are clearly doing something wrong in life...
I'm clean-ish. Generally my room gets messy (with clothes) because it's on the smaller side- but other than that, I'm good. I actually enjoy cleaning, organizing and space planning. I often move furniture around if I think of a more efficient layout. I hope you don't mind. My apartments are always a work in progress as I add new art and update furniture when possible. 
I like weird art, and sometimes make weird art. Also hope you don't mind that either. 
I don't go out a ton, I'd rather go to a big event/concert/party once every couple weeks rather than go out every weekend just cuz it's the weekend. I don't drink all that much, but I used to be a bartender- so I can definitely mix up some cocktails. I'd rather be stoned than drunk, but don't do that very often at home. 

So thats just a QUICK summary of what I'm looking for and what I have to offer. 
I'm on open book, so if you have any questions- send em my way! Honesty is the BEST policy.
If you're interested feel free to reply, but when you do, please fill out the following: 

Age, Sex, Profession:
3 Interesting Facts about yourself:
•
•
•
3 favorite songs(or artist) right now (or of all time)
•
•
•
If you could have drinks with anyone famous or of importance (dead or alive) who would it be and why?
•


If you can answer all those, then I know you're serious about living with all this awesomeness. 

I look forward to hearing from you.

title: A curious Asian male
text:
Ok, so, I'm here just to see what's out there. I'm not looking for anyone in particular. I just want to see who's out there. I guess what I'm looking for is someone I can really connect with. I'm totally cool with just being friends but I also been single(by choice) for so long that I do miss having someone there. I understand this is under platonic but I know what I'm interested in so I figured I would put this in my ad for those that fits what I'm interested in. The type of woman that usually wow's me are.. The ones that dressed up. I love a woman that's in a business attire or in those nice silky dresses. I also love my woman in gym wears and in pj's. What really gets my heart going are the ones that can dance. I'm no dancer myself but I just love a woman that can dance. I'm more into the ones that dances hip hop(not just twerking, not a big fan of that to be honest but having a booty is a plus). I also love watching a woman dance exotically(not stripping). Another thing that gives me goosebumps is a woman with a voice. A woman that can sing is just so beautiful. Dancing and singing, I can and will sit there and watch and listen to her all day. I will be one of those man that will attend to all of her events, sit there and get that butterfly feeling, saying to myself "I wish she was mine". Her last dance will give me the same feeling that I got when I saw her dance for the first time. Again, this is under platonic so I'm not looking for that type of woman. It would be nice to find someone that I been dreaming about but really, I'm here only looking for friends and if anything ever happens then it happens. I am not here looking for a hookup, let's just get that clear. I'm also not here to be anyone's sugar daddy AND MY MOM COMES FIRST. 
So, I guess I should tell you ladies a little about myself. I'm a 31 year old Asian American(Chinese) male. I stand 5'8-5'9 currently at 160(lost some weight cause I been busy and haven't been to the gym in a year but will get back into it). I'm the type of guy that enjoys dressing up but I also like to feel comfortable a lot of the times too. I enjoy wearing sweat pants a lot, shorts but again, I will dress up nicely if I need too. I am well groomed, not perfect, decent. I honestly don't know how to really describe myself cause I can be confusing sometimes. Now, as for work wise, I'm self employed(not a bum). I just do what I want and I know where my passion is. If you are going to be my friend, please be support of what I love and enjoy. I can't work for someone cause I don't enjoy having to check in to someone. I tried that and had a great job with Wells Fargo then i decided to let that go after so many years. I'm just one of those go getters. I want to create my life, my future and my wealth. I have many things coming up that I have planned for but everything will take time and of course money, which I'm working on. If you are going to be my friend or possibly more in the future, I don't need you asking me about my finances and such, esp if you are just my friend. I'm not doing anything shady. I'm just a different type of guy that is now realizing I been brain washed my whole life and now wants to go out, make my own money and help the less fortunates. By the way, if you got this far, congrats. And, yes, you heard it right, I did say help the less fortunates. I have a huge heart and will literally give my last dollar to someone that needs it more than I do. So please, if you are going to message me, having a big heart is very important to me. I don't need you to be stuck up and think you are the hottest woman in the world cause I will just ignore you. Everyone is beautiful in their own way but you don't have to be snobby about it. I've moved back and forth from Boston(currently where I'm at) and California. I've seen so many snobby and stuck up woman there, it's such a turn off. I'm not a bad looking dude, I can find myself a woman but seeing what's available from Craigslist is way more interesting to me. 
Ok, so this ad is way to long now. Haha. I got carried away. I promise you I'm not a uptight A-hole. I do joke around A LOT so please, have a sense of humor cause sometimes my jokes can come off a little dirty but I don't mean it. 
If you are interested in chatting, feel free to message me. If you would like to attach a photo of yourself so I can see who I'm chatting with, go for it, I love looking at pictures, I really do. I love all types of people. I don't just stick my race. 
Well, thanks for reading and I'm sure I'm missing a lot of things on here but feel free to message me and ask away, if you want. Take care and have a great day if I don't hear from you. Stay beautiful.
